Who would have thought that Evan would rescue Camila? Anna must be so proud!

Evan, what's going on? Why do you run around like an adventurer instead of coming home? I mean, we're doing well, but you should visit from time to time!

Wow... Golems are so scary. I never want to see another Golem again...

Oh, it's you, Evan! What brings you to town? I hope you, Alex, and I can all hang out together soon...
What? Alex said that I dress like a nerd? Hehe. Well, I don't go out much. I prefer to be comfortable.
I heard that you rescued Camila from the Golems. Evan, I'm really proud of you!

string.name: name
string.value: Athena Pierce

string.name: d0
string.value: Which selection should I make...?

string.name: d1
string.value: Which selection should I make...?

string.name: d0
string.value: The outside world is so much better than what I imagined in my egg!

string.name: d1
string.value: Master, if I'm by your side, I'll go anywhere. Anywhere!
Heh, I can defeat a pig with a single toenail! I am a Dragon, you know.
I'm so weak from hunger, I couldn't even defeat a pig. The pig would probably end up eating me... I feel so weak...
Look for the word 'impossible' in the dictionary and you'll see a picture of a Dragon eating grass. I refuse to eat it. It's gross! Bleh!
Ugh... My stomach... I feel sick.
Dad probably knows something that can help us! Huh? It's weird that I call him Dad? But what else would I call him? Your dad is my dad, Master.
The Dairy Cow might be a little scary... Just saying...
Ahh, so full. Hmm, didn't Dad say he wanted to tell us something?
Yeah, that explanation was a little wordy. To sum it up, you and I share the same destiny.
Ha! Strange Pigs aren't so different from normal Pigs. I can defeat them with one wing tied behind my back.
Haha, I defeated the Strange Pigs! I'm awesome! We better go tell Dad!
So this is what a town looks like. Wow! So many people... And they're all so busy!
So this is what helping people is all about!
Let's help people who are in trouble! I'm sure this town is full of folk who need help.
Train! Train! Traaaiiiin! Choo, choooo! Let's train, Master!
Power B. Fore, from the Hill East of Henesys... Strange name...
Eh, that Power B. Fore guy is kind of a weirdo.
Cynical Orange Mushrooms! Cynical Orange Mushrooms! What does 'cynical' mean anyway?
Master, I'm getting booooored...
What kind of oddball would raise Spores? Seriously...
Ribbon Pigs? Bah! They'll topple to the ground if I just poke them with my pinky.
You and I are heroes, Master! What? That deed wasn't significant enough to make us heroes? Psh, big or small, it's the thought that counts. Let's just call ourselves heroes!
Everyone in town knows the Master! Awesome!
Whoa, this puppet has some seriously bad mojo. You feel it?
If he's snoozing here, then who's standing guard?
A Guard isn't as impressive as a hero, but it's still an important job. Of course, I'd love to do it. Besides, who says we can't be both?
Argh! I hate to leave things hanging. I need closure. I won't be able to rest until we catch the culprit. Nella better contact us soon!
Of course I'm curious about me, but I'm more curious about my race. Where are all the other Dragons?
Onyx Dragons... Where are they? They have to be around somewhere...
A talking puppet! How bizarre! What? It's bizarre to hear a Dragon talk? No, it's not. You're silly!
I'm so glad we cleared up Sabitrama's misunderstanding. Only morons jump to conclusions. What do you mean I do it all the time?
Hmm, that puppet is actually very nice. I didn't expect that.
The folks in your hometown don't know you very well, Master. Not nearly as well as I do. It's kind of sad...
Phew, I'm so glad everything turned out okay. What a relief!
That door with the puppet on it is a big problem. What can we do? Hmm...
Hehehe. That was remarkably heroic, if I do say so myself.
A secret organization of people who do good deeds? Awesome! I'll be like one of those superheroes that hide their identites. Bat-Mir! Mir-verine! IronMir! Ooooh, I really want to join!
This organization is truly secretive. It's hard to join, because it's so selective!
Since I gave you one of my precious scales, we'd better find out more about Onyx Dragons.
Onyx Dragons are extinct...? But why? How?
No. How can Onyx Dragons be extinct when I'm right here? Uh-uh. There have to be other Onyx Dragons somewhere!
Yay, we're in! We're in! We're part of the secret organization!
This secret organization is more secretive than I imagined... What's the point of being so secretive when you're just helping other people?
A clue about Onyx Dragons? Let's ask, Master! Right now!
Go, go, go! To Lith Harbor! To John! He might know something about my race!
I can't wait to find others like me!
Another super secret mission from a super secret organization...
Hmm, how is that strange creature, Shammos, related to the secret organization? I can't figure it out.
Let's rush to that island where the Dragons live, Master!
At least now I know there's another dragon out there. I can wait longer if I have to. We'll be reunited someday. I just know it.
Ah, so the mystery of the secret organization is revealed! Sort of... But there's still so much I don't understand.
I've got a bad feeling about this mission. Is it all in my head?
What the... It's our fourth mission and we're still only temporary members?
Something... Something just isn't right...
What in the world just happened?! I don't understand what's going on...
That Dragon talked to me! I'm sure of it!
Master, I wasn't able to look into his memory. Tell me! Tell me!
Those Black Wings... They tricked us! They destroyed my species! I will never forgive them...

string.name: n1
string.value: In the deepest part of Zakum Dungeon rests the strongest of foes.

string.name: n2
string.value: Is there anyone who dares challenge Zakum?

string.value: Welcome to the retreat.

string.name: n1

string.name: n2
string.value: It's not much compared to the shops in town, but you aren't exactly in town, are you?

string.name: n0
string.value: Talk to me anytime if you want to drop out.

string.name: n1
string.value: It won't get any easier up ahead...

string.name: n0
string.value: The only way out is to talk to me.

string.name: n1
string.value: If you want out, then talk to me.

string.value: I've been in here for 30 years now...

string.name: n1
string.value: I'm working on gathering materials for some spells.

string.name: d0
string.value: It's been a while since I last saw a person here, in this place, so very far away from humanity. I've been in need of help, and I'm glad to see you here.

string.name: d1
string.value: You're the one who helped me gather those monster samples. Thanks to you, my research has picked up steam, but honestly, I could use some more samples. If you see me by the time I run out of these samples, who knows? I may ask you for more.

string.name: n0
string.value: You must form a party to challenge Zakum.

string.name: n1
string.value: Talk to me if you wish to challenge Zakum.

string.name: d1
string.value: You got me those #b#t4031093##k. I'm still eating them every now and then. Oh, by the way, have you talked to #b#p2040002##k, the guy next to me?

string.name: n1

string.name: d1
string.value: Not only did you defeat the monster from another dimension, but you helped us fix the Ludibrium Clocktower. I can't thank you enough for all your hard work! Thanks to you, everything is all right. Have a great time here in Ludibrium!

string.name: d0
string.value: Hello there! I'm #b#p2040015##k, the guy in charge of the Toy Factory. Today's another one of those busy days...

string.name: d1
string.value: Oh! You're the one that met up with our Roly-Polies in Eos Tower for me! How can I help you? Huh? Haha, of course, I didn't forget the lunch box my daughter made for me. I'm just waiting for lunch, so I can eat it! I'll see you around!

string.name: func
string.value: Refining Expert

string.name: n0
string.value: Don't you want to make something? It's a piece of cake for me!

string.name: n1
string.value: Hmmm... You can gather some really fine materials here in Ludibrium.

string.name: name
string.value: Green M-Forcer

string.name: n0
string.value: As long as we're here, everything will be fine!

string.name: n1
string.value: Did we miss our takeoff...?

string.name: d0
string.value: I'm here on a very important assignment for the Omega Sector. It's very dangerous around here, so I suggest you get out of here while you still can.

string.name: d1
string.value: The Roswell Field is prone to alien appearances, so this place is under constant watch. The battle is still ongoing, so I suggest you and the others not get too comfortable here. For now, I have to head back to the Sector for some more work. See you around!

string.name: name
string.value: Black M-Forcer

string.name: n0
string.value: Pink M-Forcer is ALWAYS late... we can't be at 100% strength unless all 5 of us are here.

string.name: n1
string.value: Nothing scares us when all 5 of us are together!

string.name: d0
string.value: Hello! I'm #b#p2040018##k, and my mission is to prevent the alien invasion here. There's been a lot more activity lately, and it's gotten very dangerous around here. I suggest you run back to the Omega Sector where it's safe.

string.name: d1
string.value: Oh! You're the one that helped me get the #b#o4230116##k out of Coolan Field! It's good to find someone like you here where dangerous aliens are so common. I'm still investigating the mastermind behind all this and going up against yet another alien. It's not going to be easy.

string.value: Doctor Assistant

string.name: n0
string.value: Welcome to our hospital! Your face looks terrrible. Need my help?

string.value: Don't you want to head off to Florina Beach?

string.value: You look exhausted. How about spending some time relaxing at Florina Beach?

string.name: name
string.value: Gumball Machine

string.name: func
string.value: General Goods

string.name: name
string.value: Eurek the Alchemist

string.name: s0
string.value: With a few materials, you can make summoning rocks and magic rocks.

string.name: d0
string.value: Hello there. I'm Eurek the Alchemist. I'm wandering throughout the world of MapleStory. I'm just stopping here for a bit.

string.name: s2
string.value: I sell potions! Good potions!

string.name: a0
string.value: What do you think?

string.name: s0
string.value: This is the best medicine ever made!

string.name: s1
string.value: You can take something to recover or something to boost your speed, so you can avoid getting hurt.

string.name: a1
string.value: Check this place out. Isn't it cool?

string.name: s3
string.value: I made this myself, but there aren't many left. You should buy them now before it's too late.

string.name: name
string.value: Wiz the Librarian

string.name: n0
string.value: This library has more than just old-fashioned books. There are several fun fairy tales... Well, there used to be.

string.name: n1
string.value: I'd love to find the lost books soon.

string.name: d0
string.value: All the books are mixed up.

string.name: d1
string.value: This library is finally beginning to resemble a normal library.

string.name: func
string.value: Cabin Crew

string.name: n2
string.value: For those who'd like to board the boat to Orbis Station, right this way please!

string.name: n0
string.value: If you want board the ship to Orbis, please hand me your ticket.

string.name: n1
string.value: We've got limited space, so please board soon! We're about to take off!

string.name: n2
string.value: Please be aware that if you enter the Cash Shop while on board, you'll be sent back to where you started.

string.name: n0
string.value: Can I help you with anything? Enjoy your trip!

string.name: n1
string.value: Anyone that wants to leave the ship and return to the starting point, please come talk to me.

string.name: func
string.value: Weapon Seller

string.name: n0
string.value: There are places in Ludibrium where the monsters pop out of nowhere.

string.name: n1
string.value: We have a weapon JUST FOR YOU!

string.name: func
string.value: Armor Seller

string.name: n0
string.value: Welcome! Take a look around and see what you like.

string.name: n1
string.value: Tough armor is a necessity. Monsters could pop up anywhere in the castle!

string.name: n0
string.value: Make sure you don't get lost inside the castle.

string.name: n1
string.value: Welcome to Ludibrium!

string.name: d0
string.value: Hello there! I'm #b#p2041004##k, head of Ludibrium security. Lately there have been some filthy creatures dirtying up Eos Tower, and I don't like it one bit.

string.name: d1
string.value: Hey! You're the one that cleaned out Eos Tower for me! How have you been? I'm thrilled the number of monsters has decreased, and they aren't as wild as they were before. I really appreciate all your hard work. I hope you have a great day in Ludibrium!

string.name: n0
string.value: Hey, there! How's it going?

string.name: n1
string.value: Isn't it beautiful today? I would like nothing more than to just go somewhere...

string.name: d0
string.value: Oh,hi! I don't think I've met you before... Have you been traveling around? I'm #b#p2041005##k, a resident here in Ludibrium. My father is the manager of the Toy Factory. If you have time, you should go see that place.

string.name: d1
string.value: Hello! Thanks to you, my dad got his appetite back! How can I help you today? Oh no! Don't come in here with your shoes on! I just cleaned! Please come back some other time!

string.name: n0
string.value: We sell stuff that you can't find anywhere else!

string.name: n1
string.value: Need potions or some food? You've come to the right place.

string.name: a0
string.value: You! You're not trying to swipe something, are you?

string.name: a1
string.value: Touch anything, and I'll be very, very angry with you!

string.name: g0
string.value: Making new potions is tougher than you think.

string.name: g1
string.value: Hah! Just making new potions here...

string.name: n1
string.value: If you want to try a different hair style, then just talk to me!

string.name: n0
string.value: Oh my, you still have that hairdo? That's sooo yesterday...

string.name: func
string.value: Storage Keeper

string.name: n0
string.value: Looking for a place to store your mesos or items? Then look no further!

string.name: n1
string.value: Our storage is safe as can be, so feel free to leave your stuff here!

string.name: n1
string.value: It's a tough act being a hair stylist...

string.name: n0
string.value: Welcome to our Hair Salon! I'm still learning, but would you let me do your hair?

string.name: d0
string.value: Welcome to our Hair Salon! I'm still learning, but would you let me do your hair?

string.name: d1
string.value: Strong explorers are awesome! But good-looking once are even better!

string.name: func
string.value: Plastic Surgeon

string.name: n0
string.value: Wanna change your face into something... Much more beautiful?

string.name: n1
string.value: You look fine now, but with a little touch here and there, you'll look FANTABULOUS!

string.name: name
string.value: Yellow M-Forcer

string.name: n0
string.value: Worried about monsters? Let us handle them!

string.name: n1
string.value: It's our job to protect everyone here!

string.name: d0
string.value: Hi. I'm #b#p2041011##k, and I'm leading a special mission here. Have you seen any aliens? They like to trick innocent strangers by sweet-talking them, so be on your guard.

string.name: d1
string.value: Hi. I'm #b#p2041011##k, and I'm leading a special mission here. Have you seen any aliens? They like to trick innocent strangers by sweet-talking them, so be on your guard.

string.name: name
string.value: Pink M-Forcer

string.name: n0
string.value: It's so hard to wake up early each morning. I should stop being late...

string.name: n1
string.value: I'm more than happy to protect you all, except that I sleep waaay too much...

string.name: d0
string.value: Hello,there. I'm #b#p2041012##k on secret assignment from the Omega Sector to stop the alien invasion. All of my important missions have been keeping me very busy! Oh, an this place is really dangerous. I suggest you find somewhere safer to be.

string.name: d1
string.value: You're back! I've been so much more punctual lately. Even the big wigs upstairs are noticing. And it's all thanks to you! Now, I have something important to do, so please excuse me!

string.name: n0
string.value: You want to have a slim body like me? I will make your skin beautiful!

string.name: n1
string.value: Wow... You must be traveling all around. Your skin's really damaged.

string.name: func
string.value: Pet Food Merchant

string.name: n0
string.value: Are you looking for pet food?

string.name: n1
string.value: Aren't your pets hungry? I got some food for them!

string.name: f0
string.value: I feel like I've witnessed something incredible.

string.name: f1
string.value: ...I don't remember...the last few months...that I've been...missing...

string.name: f2
string.value: I've been trying to remember things, but it's hard.

string.name: f3
string.value: Did something terrible happen to me?

string.name: w0
string.value: Whenever I think about that day... I just feel terrified and burst into tears.

string.name: w1
string.value: Please... Someone help me regain my lost memory.

string.name: d0
string.value: Hmmm...? I don't think we've ever met. What are you doing in my house? If you don't have anything to talk about, then please leave.

string.name: d1
string.value: You're the one that helped me find my lost memories. I can't thank you enough for your effort. I've been trying to live a normal life these days.

string.name: func
string.value: Scroll Seller

string.name: n0
string.value: I admit, I fail at making scrolls occasionally, but it's very rare!

string.name: n1
string.value: I've made my share of mistakes making these scrolls, but don't worry. I'm good at this!

string.name: name
string.value: Ace of Hearts

string.name: n0
string.value: Sweet chocolate can go a long way toward telling your beloved 'I LOVE YOU!'

string.name: n1
string.value: I, the Ace of Hearts, will let you in on the sweet, chocolatey secret recipe of love!

string.name: d0
string.value: I'm here to bake lovely treats! Doesn't it smell scrumptious here? Mmm hmmm!

string.name: d1
string.value: I can only make so much of it by myself. Bear with me. I can only make you one per hour.

string.name: name
string.value: Hans the Assembler

string.name: n0
string.value: What should I make today?

string.name: f0
string.value: I am the best at assembling toys here at the Toy Factory.

string.name: f1
string.value: Gather the materials I need, and I'll make something nice for you in return!

string.name: d0
string.value: I just need a few things to make a fun toy to play with, but I don't know if I'm even allowed to make this.

string.name: d1
string.value: Hey,what's going on? Have you tried using the stuff I gave you? That item had some experimental elements to it, so it's a little dangerous, but it was fun to make something I've always dreamed of. Well, I have to get back to work now. See ya!

string.name: name
string.value: Rocky the Repairman

string.name: n0
string.value: Why does this keep breaking down?

string.name: d0
string.value: It's broken again... And I just fixed this not too long ago! Who did this?! If only I could get my hands on whoever's responsible for this... ARRGH!

string.name: d1
string.value: Oh no! It must be the monsters again. As soon as I fix this, they come rushing back to break it again. Thanks to the parts you got me, I've at least been able to fix things here and there, but my work's never done. Anyway, I gotta go!

string.name: name
string.value: Mac the Mechanic

string.name: n0
string.value: These machines need daily care...

string.name: d0
string.value: Great weather today! I'm #b#p2041020##k, and I work here at the Toy Factory. I'm in charge of making blueprints for the machines around here and fixing them if necessary.

string.name: d1
string.value: You're back! I've been working like a fiend thanks to the documents you got me. Oh, and this time, I hid them in a safe just in case. So thanks! I have to get back to work now. See you around!

string.name: name
string.value: Mr. Bouffon

string.name: n0
string.value: We need to find the source of power for the time sphere at the center of Ludibrium.

string.name: n1
string.value: We need an energy replacement for the time sphere. Please gather up Tachions.

string.name: s0
string.value: We have to seal the Dimensional Schism.

string.name: s1
string.value: If you break the time sphere, you'll come face to face with the source of all evil!

string.name: d0
string.value: I'm Mr. Bouffon, guardian of the Path of Time.

string.name: d1
string.value: Thanks to you the root of all evil in Ludibrium is gone forever! Only peaceful days lay ahead.

string.name: name
string.value: Tigun the Advisor

string.name: s0
string.value: Are you here to deliver the history book? Let's see...

string.name: d0
string.value: I, Tigun the Advisor, am responsible for helping the King of Ludibrium run this place as smoothly as possible. Hmmm...

string.name: d1
string.value: Aren't you the honorable traveler? Did you meet with #t1012109#? You remind me of my own traveling days... I was one fearless kid back then...

string.name: s0
string.value: Time for a magic show!

string.name: s1
string.value: Check out this eye-popping magic!

string.name: d0
string.value: I'm Flo, in charge of protecting the Path of Time. Would you like to see me work my magic?

string.name: d1
string.value: Showtime! Am I good or what?

string.name: name
string.value: Machine Apparatus

string.name: name
string.value: Ghosthunter Bob

string.name: s0
string.value: When was the last time I had a decent meal? Urgh...

string.name: s1
string.value: They're hard to handle!

string.name: t0
string.value: Hey! Who do you think you are, roaming around this place like you own it?

string.name: d0
string.value: Hmmm... Gotta concentrate!

string.name: d1
string.value: I feel a negative vibe around here...

string.name: name
string.value: Mason the Collector

string.name: m0
string.value: Look, but don't touch! These items are precious!

string.name: m1
string.value: I need to collect, collect, and collect...

string.name: d0
string.value: I want this, this, this, and that...

string.name: d1
string.value: Anything else to collect?!

string.name: name
string.value: Unknown Thief

string.name: n0
string.value: If you want something, you'll need to pay for it.

string.name: n1
string.value: Do you want something from me?

string.name: d0
string.value: I can't believe I'm here doing chores like this. I understand it's an order, but that doesn't make it any easier.

string.name: d1
string.value: It's surprising Hellin would look out for someone like you. Of course, I'm sure it's not all that fun to be under a microscope. He's quite ruthless, to say the least.

string.name: n0
string.value: This is the time control room for Ludibrium. Only authorized personnel may enter.

string.name: n1
string.value: I can't believe time controller's security device is broken. What should I do...?

string.name: d0
string.value: Oh no! Someone destroyed the security device for the time controller!

string.name: d1
string.value: Ahhh... I can't believe you just skipped time like that. The goddess will not forgive you for it.

string.name: n0
string.value: The end is coming!

string.name: n1
string.value: You, too, can be chosen!

string.name: d0
string.value: We should wait patiently for the Black Mage to resurrect.

string.name: d1
string.value: As the servant of the Black Mage, I can help you all!

string.name: name
string.value: Death Teddy

string.name: d0
string.value: Oh no! Someone destroyed the security device for the time controller!

string.name: d1
string.value: Freely traveling time and space... The goddess will never forgive you.

string.name: n0
string.value: One, two, three, four... Wait a minute! That one's not mine!

string.name: n1
string.value: Sigh... Parenting is so hard...

string.name: d0
string.value: All of my kids make me happy... But I never have a second to myself. I'm always busy counting my babies.

string.name: d1
string.value: All of my kids make me happy... But I never have a second to myself. I'm always busy counting my babies.

string.name: name
string.value: Ducky Five

string.name: d0
string.value: Running is more fun than walking! I want to run! Faster!

string.name: d1
string.value: No more running. Now I want to fly! What can I do to fly?

string.name: func
string.value: Monster Carnival

string.name: n0
string.value: If you wanna see something special, come on down to the Monster Carnival!

string.name: n1
string.value: Aren't you curious to see who the strongest adventurer is amongst your friends?

string.value: Monster Carnival

string.name: n0
string.value: All of you will exit this place as soon as you talk to me.

string.name: func
string.value: Monster Carnival

string.name: n0
string.value: If you wanna see something special, come on down to the Monster Carnival!

string.name: n1
string.value: Show your friends who's the toughest at the Monster Carnival!

string.name: n0
string.value: The crack in our dimension... When will the experiment end?

string.name: n1
string.value: If only I can warp time...

string.name: name
string.value: Dr. San

string.name: func
string.value: Weapon Vendor

string.name: n0
string.value: I have lots of weapons for you. Pick one!

string.name: n1
string.value: It is so hard to find material for weapons in these days. There are just too many monsters.

string.name: name
string.value: Dr. Kim

string.name: n0
string.value: We need to get going soon, but where is everyone?

string.name: n1
string.value: Hmm... You guys are not strong enough to fight against aliens yet...

string.name: d0
string.value: Oh... It's the greatest masterpiece of all time, created by me! With this blueprint, I can make the most indestructible robot ever!

string.name: d1
string.value: Hmmm... The fuel's fine, the parts are fine... And by debugging this critical error in the Alpha system... Huh? Can I help you? I'm busy developing new machines, so unless you need me for something, talk to someone else. I need to get back to work.

string.name: name
string.value: Alien Gray

string.name: n0
string.value: I'm Gray, from outer space...

string.name: n1
string.value: I want to be your friend.

string.name: d0
string.value: The Omega Sector is busy attacking innocent aliens again... How unfortunate...

string.name: d1
string.value: Hahaha! You fool! We're already deciphering the critical document you gave me. Before, the Omega Sector's security has been ironclad, but it's only a matter of time now. And I don't need you anymore, so get lost!

string.name: func
string.value: Armor Vendor

string.name: n0
string.value: We have lots of excellent armor in Omega Sector.

string.name: n1
string.value: You must have good armor to fight against the aliens.

string.name: name
string.value: Kubo the Storageman

string.name: func
string.value: Storage Keeper

string.name: n0
string.value: Are you looking for a storage place?

string.name: n1
string.value: My storage is totally safe! I guarantee it...

string.name: n0
string.value: Tsk, tsk... I'll be late if I don't get going!

string.name: n1
string.value: As long as I'm here, this place is safe!

string.name: d0
string.value: This is my first break in a long time. I've been up the past few days on missions. The aliens always act up after dark... Anyway, I need to enjoy this as much as I can. Then again, I should still be on guard...

string.name: d1
string.value: You're the one that brought #b#p2050001#'s#k #b#t4031100##k here and showed it to me. I can't thank you enough for that. How's the robot coming along? I can't wait for the day I get my hands on it. Now, I need to finish my training, so please excuse me.

string.name: n0
string.value: Where is Mirol...?

string.name: n1
string.value: I'm getting tired of going on missions every day.

string.name: d0
string.value: I'm #b#p2050006##k here on a secret mission from the Omega Sector. Now don't take this personally. You seem like a trustworthy person, but I can't divulge any sensitive mission intel.

string.name: d1
string.value: You're the one that brought #b#p2050001#'s#k #b#t4031100##k here and showed it to me. I can't thank you enough for that. How's the robot coming along? I can't wait for the day I get to have my hands on that robot. Now I need to get back to work...

string.name: n0
string.value: Hoon is always whining.

string.name: n1
string.value: We need some female pilots.

string.name: d0
string.value: I'm #b#p2050007##k here on a secret mission from the Omega Sector. Now don't take this personally. You seem like a trustworthy person, but I can't divulge any sensitive mission intel.

string.name: d1
string.value: You're the one that brought #b#p2050001#'s#k #b#t4031100##k here and showed it to me. I can't thank you enough for that. How's the robot coming along? I can't wait for the day I get to have my hands on that robot. Now I need to get back to work...

string.name: name
string.value: General Maestro

string.name: n0
string.value: My army is here to protect this place today, tomorrow, as long as they need us.

string.name: n1
string.value: I don't have time for idle chit chat. I'm in the middle of an important operation.

string.name: d0
string.value: Thanks for coming to the Omega Sector. Now stay alert! The aliens could attack at any moment. And while you're here, there's someone who could use your help. If you're interested, go talk to them.

string.name: d1
string.value: The weather is just perfect outside! This place is so secure and protected from aliens that it's been eerily quiet the last few days. But I can't complain. I'm so grateful for all the help you gave me!

string.name: name
string.value: Jr. Officer Medin

string.name: n0
string.value: I'm in charge of protecting the general as well as directing the army.

string.name: n1
string.value: I am not going to tolerate anyone slacking off!

string.name: d0
string.value: A-ten-hut! Can you help me perhaps?

string.name: d1
string.value: Good job. I will work harder to assist General Maestro.

string.name: name
string.value: Rice the Medic

string.name: n0
string.value: I've studied a lot, but I don't have real working experience yet.

string.name: n1
string.value: Red medicine should take care of most injuries.

string.name: d0
string.value: I'm #b#p2050010##k, and as you can see, I care for the wounded here in the Omega Sector. You should take a page from my book and keep a wary eye. You never know when aliens will attack!

string.name: d1
string.value: I'm #b#p2050010##k, and as you can see, I care for the wounded here in the Omega Sector. You should take a page from my book and keep a wary eye. You never know when aliens will attack!

string.name: name
string.value: Kevin the Soldier

string.name: n0
string.value: I heard there are aliens everywhere outside... I wish I could go fight them too.

string.name: n1
string.value: Jr. Officer Medin is famous for being so strict.

string.name: d0
string.value: *Sigh.* I wish I could go outside and take on the aliens myself, but I'm stuck doing work at HQ. I know I could kick some serious space-butt too. When will I get to help defend the planet...?

string.name: d1
string.value: *Sigh.* I wish I could go outside and take on the aliens myself, but I'm stuck doing work at HQ. I know I could kick some serious space-butt too. When will I get to help defend the planet...?

string.name: name
string.value: Agent M

string.name: n0
string.value: Hey... Have you ever seen an alien?

string.name: n1
string.value: Please don't tell anyone that you met me.

string.name: d0
string.value: Shh! It's better if you pretend like you don't know me. I'm in the middle of a very important mission. If you don't have anything important to discuss, just leave.

string.name: d1
string.value: Hmm... #b#p2041015##k seems to have retrieved her lost memories. Warn her to be more careful, so she doesn't get abducted by aliens again, and it there's nothing else, you can move on.

string.name: n0
string.value: I'm Porter, a researcher here in the Omega Sector.

string.name: n1
string.value: I have so much to research, I don't even have time to sleep.

string.name: d0
string.value: Hello there! My name is #b#p2050013##k, and I'm helping #b#p2050001##k develop a new robot here at headquarters. Sniffle... The new robot's coming along nicely, but I've been feeling a bit under the weather for a while now. Sniff... If you'll excuse me, I have to get back to work. Can't get caught slacking...

string.name: d1
string.value: Hello there! My name is #b#p2050013##k, and I'm helping #b#p2050001##k develop a new robot here at headquarters. Sniffle... The new robot's coming along nicely, but I've been feeling a bit under the weather for a while now. Sniff... If you'll excuse me, I have to get back to work. Can't get caught slacking...

string.value: Meteorite 1

string.name: name
string.value: Meteorite 2

string.value: Meteorite 4

string.name: name
string.value: Meteorite 5

string.name: name
string.value: Meteorite 6

string.name: d0
string.value: Hello there! How goes your training?

string.name: d1
string.value: Talking nonstop is plain annoying.

string.name: name
string.value: Dr. Pepper

string.name: n0
string.value: I hope these potions can help you out here.

string.name: n1
string.value: My potions are excellent! Completely different from other potions!

string.name: n0
string.value: The Omega Sector contains many important mechanical parts.

string.name: n1
string.value: My job is to maintain these machines.

string.name: d0
string.value: Hi! I'm the head engineer of the Omega Sector, #b#p2051001##k. I don't have a whole lot of work, but I'm really busy because I don't have any assistants.

string.name: d1

string.name: name
string.value: The Venerable Mr. Q

string.name: n0
string.value: Har har har.

string.name: n1
string.value: If you're just passing through, go right ahead.

string.name: name
string.value: Martin Fan

string.name: n0
string.value: Hello! I'm the best chef in Taiwan.

string.name: n1
string.value: What should I cook up today?

string.name: d1
string.value: Cut up the ingredients, pour some oil in the pan, and fry, fry, fry! Cooking is so much fun!

string.name: d0
string.value: Are you here to taste my famous food?

string.name: name
string.value: Gumstick Girl

string.name: n0
string.value: Mister! You wanna buy some gum?

string.name: n1
string.value: Delicious gum for sale! Lots of different flavors! Bubblegum, mint, cinnamon!

string.name: d0
string.value: Hello! I'm the Gumstick Girl.

string.name: d1
string.value: Would you like to buy some gum?

string.name: name
string.value: Mr. Ho

string.name: n0
string.value: I've been working here for 30 years already.

string.name: n1
string.value: I don't seem to have enough materials to sell... Is there anyone that can help me?

string.name: d0
string.value: Welcome! I'm Mr. Oh, the street vendor.

string.name: d1
string.value: Business just isn't what it used to be.

string.name: n0
string.value: I want to become the best Hair Stylist in Taiwan.

string.name: n1
string.value: My boyfriend is... Hehe, that's a secret. Ah, I really miss him.

string.name: d0
string.value: Hello! I'm Judy.

string.name: d1
string.value: Thank you for helping me out the other day.

string.name: n0
string.value: Please take a look at our beautiful accessories.

string.name: n1
string.value: We have many items that are very popular in Taiwan.

string.name: d0
string.value: Hello, I'm Christine.

string.name: d1
string.value: I hope my friend is doing okay.

string.name: func
string.value: Hair Salon Owner

string.name: n0
string.value: Would you like to have the most popular hairstyle in Taiwan?

string.name: n1
string.value: Just tell me what type of hairstyle you want.

string.name: func
string.value: Hair Salon Assistant

string.name: n0
string.value: I'm Julie, Niki's favorite protege.

string.name: n1
string.value: Try changing your hairstyle if you're tired of your old one.

string.name: name
string.value: Dr. Nihao

string.name: func
string.value: Plastic Surgeon

string.name: n0
string.value: Would you like to become more beautiful?

string.name: n1
string.value: I can give you a beautiful new look!

string.value: Nurse Ling Ling

string.name: func
string.value: Plastic Surgery Nurse

string.name: n1
string.value: Want plastic surgery? You've come to the right place!

string.name: n0
string.value: I may not be as good as the doctor, but I can still make you beautiful.

string.name: name
string.value: Dr. Wink Lee

string.name: n0
string.value: If you want a healthy, sun-kissed look, I recommend copper-toned skin.

string.name: n1
string.value: Oh, you want to have a clear complexion? Just leave it to me!

string.name: name
string.value: Roan Li

string.name: n0
string.value: The Night Market is the symbol of Taiwan!

string.name: n1
string.value: *Sigh.* I feel so empty. Maybe I need someone special in my life.

string.name: name
string.value: Ivanna Mann

string.name: n0
string.value: The food at the Night Market is so yummy. It's not helping my diet!

string.name: n1
string.value: Sometimes I just want to take off and go somewhere far! Where should I go?

string.value: Fruit always taste better when it's in season. Hahaha...

string.name: n1
string.value: Whew... I'm getting too old for this line of work.

string.value: Is everything okay inside?

string.name: n2
string.value: Double-click on an item in the item inventory and you'll be able to use it.

string.name: f1
string.value: If your item inventory is full, you won't be able to take in new items. You should take care of the unimportant ones by either discarding them or selling them at a store.

string.name: f2
string.value: Use items can also be stored on the bottom right tray where you can assign HotKey's...

Did you forget? I'm Afinas's youngest scholar! I know I can be of help to you.

I'm sure somebody lives around here.
